app_store_listing.description:
Experience weather like never before with Andernet Weather ‚Äî designed exclusively for iOS 26 with Apple's stunning Liquid Glass design language.

BEAUTIFUL LIQUID GLASS INTERFACE
‚Ä¢ Native iOS 26 Liquid Glass effects throughout
‚Ä¢ Dynamic weather backgrounds that match conditions
‚Ä¢ Smooth animations and haptic feedback

COMPREHENSIVE WEATHER DATA
‚Ä¢ Real-time temperature with "feels like" readings
‚Ä¢ Hourly and 7-day forecasts with interactive charts
‚Ä¢ Air Quality Index (AQI) with detailed pollutant data
‚Ä¢ Sunrise/sunset times with daylight duration
‚Ä¢ Wind speed, humidity, and precipitation data

POWERFUL WIDGETS & LIVE ACTIVITIES
‚Ä¢ Home Screen widgets in multiple sizes
‚Ä¢ Lock Screen widgets for quick glances
‚Ä¢ Live Activities show weather on your Lock Screen
‚Ä¢ Control Center widget for instant access

SMART FEATURES
‚Ä¢ Siri Shortcuts for voice-activated weather
‚Ä¢ Save favorite locations for quick access
‚Ä¢ Weather maps with satellite overlays
‚Ä¢ Customizable themes and units
‚Ä¢ Background location for automatic updates

PRIVACY FOCUSED
‚Ä¢ No tracking or advertising
‚Ä¢ Location used only for weather data
‚Ä¢ Open-source weather API (Open-Meteo)

Download Andernet Weather today and experience the future of weather apps!
app_store_listing.promotional_text: Now with iOS 26 Liquid Glass design! Experience weather forecasts with stunning translucent effects and Live Activities.

testflight.beta_app_description:
Thank you for testing Andernet Weather!

This beta includes all features of the upcoming 1.0 release:
‚Ä¢ Beautiful Liquid Glass design for iOS 26
‚Ä¢ Real-time weather with hourly/daily forecasts
‚Ä¢ Interactive charts and weather maps
‚Ä¢ Widgets and Live Activities
‚Ä¢ Air Quality Index monitoring
‚Ä¢ Customizable themes

WHAT TO TEST:
‚Ä¢ Search and save favorite locations
‚Ä¢ Try all widget sizes (Home/Lock Screen)
‚Ä¢ Test Live Activities on Lock Screen
‚Ä¢ Switch between Celsius/Fahrenheit
‚Ä¢ Try different color themes
‚Ä¢ Test with different network conditions
‚Ä¢ Check VoiceOver accessibility

KNOWN ISSUES:
‚Ä¢ Weather particle effects temporarily disabled
‚Ä¢ Widget refresh timing controlled by iOS

PLEASE REPORT:
‚Ä¢ Crashes or freezes
‚Ä¢ UI layout issues
‚Ä¢ Missing accessibility labels
‚Ä¢ Confusing interactions
‚Ä¢ Feature requests

Use TestFlight's built-in feedback tool (shake device) or email support@andernet.dev
testflight.what_to_test:
‚Ä¢ All weather data displays correctly
‚Ä¢ Widgets update and show accurate data
‚Ä¢ Live Activities work on Lock Screen
‚Ä¢ Location services work properly
‚Ä¢ Settings persist correctly
‚Ä¢ Themes apply properly
‚Ä¢ Accessibility features (VoiceOver, Dynamic Type)
‚Ä¢ Dark/Light mode transitions

review_notes.notes:
Andernet Weather is a weather forecast app designed for iOS 26.

TEST ACCOUNT: Not required

FEATURES TO REVIEW:
‚Ä¢ Main weather view with current conditions
‚Ä¢ Hourly forecast with interactive charts
‚Ä¢ 7-day forecast
‚Ä¢ Weather maps
‚Ä¢ Widgets (Home/Lock Screen)
‚Ä¢ Live Activities
‚Ä¢ Location search and favorites

LOCATION USAGE:
‚Ä¢ Used only for weather forecasts
‚Ä¢ Can be declined - manual search available
‚Ä¢ Background location (optional) for widget updates

THIRD-PARTY APIS:
‚Ä¢ Open-Meteo (free weather API, no tracking)
‚Ä¢ No other third-party services

PRIVACY:
‚Ä¢ No user accounts
‚Ä¢ No tracking or analytics
‚Ä¢ Location not stored/shared
‚Ä¢ All data local to device
review_notes.special_instructions: The app works best with location enabled, but can be fully tested with manual city search if you prefer not to grant location access.
